name: Moo Juice
description:
Milk and transform cows to sell colorful juices!

Your goal is to gain as much coin as possible by selling various colors of Moo Juice.

Fulfill a week of daily "Moo Juice" orders by milking your cows and growing crops. Feed your harvest to the cows, transforming their color, and subsequently, the milk they produce. It's deceptively simple, but you must plan ahead and move fast in order to make coin.

Controls:

"W, A, S, D" to move

"E" to open inventory

Click, drag, and click to move items

Walk over grown crops to harvest them
